case.name: Identifying name (ex. Game start)
case.description: She's not just "not that special", she's ordanary. Tell her she's absolutely ordanary!

case.name: Identifying name (ex. Hand=Any)
case.description: Playing Old Maid at a class trip? How ordanary!

case.name: Identifying name (ex. Must Strip (Self))
case.description: She only plays the ordanary poker. No strip poker.

case.name: Identifying name (ex. Stripping)
case.description: She will do what every normal girl does when she notices that this is strip poker: Leave. She won't come back.

case.description: She only plays the ordanary poker. No strip poker.

case.name: Identifying name (ex. Opponent Stripping)
case.description: She will do what every normal girl does when she notices that this is strip poker: Leave. She won't come back.

case.name: Identifying name (ex. Stripping)
case.description: Please don't target her stripping for fun's sake. Generics are absolutely funny.
